title: Ultra-high performance of ionic thermoelectric-electrochemical gel cells for harvesting low grade heat
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01150C, Paper
Yong-Bin Zhu, Cheng-Gong Han, Jiawei Chen, Li-Juan Yang, Yingming Ma, Hong-Yu Guan, Dongxue Han, Li Niu
Gels-based ionic thermoelectric (i-TE) conversion has attracted more attention to harvesting energy from ambient waste heat to power sensors in IoT systems, due to its high ionic thermopower, cost-effectiveness, and...
